title: Speed Trap Pro
summary: Speed Trap helps you to be warned about the presence of speed cameras.
description: ** With the application does not provide any default database ** To know where to download the points and read the manual visit Speed Trap (link at the bottom of the page).The pro version includes more features than the free version:1) Delete files after import2) Integration with the most popular applications of automation3) Export Data4) Vibration5) HUD6) Support for Android Wear7) Map Editor with 3d display8) Support Bluetooth9) Widgets10) Voice activation11) Auto update via plugin12) Import/Export and settings for backup13) Bluetooth headset supportSome images from: http://www.wear-generator.com according to CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
descriptionHTML:
** With the application does not provide any default database **

To know where to download the points and read the manual visit Speed Trap (link at the bottom of the page).

The pro version includes more features than the free version:
1) Delete files after import
2) Integration with the most popular applications of automation
3) Export Data
4) Vibration
5) HUD
6) Support for Android Wear
7) Map Editor with 3d display
8) Support Bluetooth
9) Widgets
10) Voice activation
11) Auto update via plugin
12) Import/Export and settings for backup
13) Bluetooth headset support


Some images from: http://www.wear-generator.com according to CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
comments: excellent and has a manual and very good support (I was having problems with file import)
